caption.title: List of fly stocks used in this study.

tr.th: Genotype (as reported in FlyBase when available)

tr.td: w[1118]; In(2LR)Gla, wg[Gla-1]/CyO, P{w[+mC]=GAL4 twi.G}2.2, P{w[+mC]=UAS-2xEGFP}AH2.2
w[1118]; Dr[Mio]/TM3, P{w[+mC]=GAL4 twi.G}2.3, P{UAS-2xEGFP}AH2.3, Sb[1] Ser[1]
w[*]; ry[506] Dr[1]/TM6B, P{w[+mC]=Dfd-EYFP}3, Sb[1] Tb[1] ca[1]
Expresses the RNAi against crb under the control of UAS sequences; VDRC 39177
Expresses the RNAi against sdt under the control of UAS sequences; VDRC 23822
Expresses dsRNA for RNAi of sdt (FBgn0261873) under UAS control. BSC 37510
y[1] sc[*] v[1]; P{y[+t7.7] v[+t1.8]=VALIUM20 EGFP.shRNA.3}attP40
Expresses small hairpin RNA under the control of UAS for RNAi of EGFP and EYFP as well as fusion proteins containing these fluors, BSC 41559
y[1] sc[*] v[1]; P{y[+t7.7] v[+t1.8]=VALIUM20 EGFP.shRNA.3}attP2
Expresses small hairpin RNA under the control of UAS for RNAi of EGFP and EYFP as well as fusion proteins containing these fluors, BSC 41560
Expresses the RNAi against moe under the control of UAS sequences; VDRC 37917
Expresses dsRNA for RNAi of kst (FBgn0004167) under UAS control, BSC 50536
Expresses dsRNA for RNAi of Ocrl (FBgn0023508) under UAS control in the VALIUM20 vector. BSC 34722
Expresses temperature-sensitive GAL80 under the control of the alphaTub84B promoter; outcrossed from BSC 7018
Expresses Dicer-2 under UAS control, BSC 24650
Expresses dsRNA for RNAi of didum (FBgn0261397) under UAS control; BSC 55740
Expresses a snapback transcript for RNAi of Pten under the control of UAS. BSC 8549
Expresses a snapback transcript for RNAi of Pten under the control of UAS. BSC 8550
Expresses dsRNA for RNAi of Pi3K92E (FBgn0015279) under UAS control. BSC 61182
Expresses dsRNA for RNAi of Pi3K92E (FBgn0015279) under UAS control. BSC 35798
Expresses dsRNA for RNAi of sktl (FBgn0016984) under UAS control. BSC 35198
Expresses the N-terminus of Serp including the signal peptide and chitin binding domain (CBD) fused to GFP (Luschnig et al., 2006), kindly provided by S. Luschning
Expresses full length didum (amino acids 1–1792) tagged at the C-terminal end with EGFP (Krauss et al., 2009), kindly provided by A. Ephrussi
Stranded at Second fused with Venus under tubulin promoter on 3rd chromosome (Firmino et al., 2013)
Expresses GFP-tagged peanut agglutinin under UAS control. BSC 55247
Expresses mCD8-tagged RFP under the control of 10 UAS sequences. BSC 32218
Expresses GFP-tagged pleckstrin homology domain from human PLCδ. BSC 39693
Expresses GFP-tagged pleckstrin homology domain from cytohesin/GRP1 (Pinal et al., 2006), kindly provided by F. Pichaud
Expresses Pten2 isoform GFP-tagged under the control of UAS sequences (Pinal et al., 2006), kindly provided by F. Pichaud
Expresses the Pten2 isoform under the control of UAS sequences (von Stein et al., 2005), kindly provided by A. Wodarz
On 3rd chromosome, expresses GAL4 under the control of the fkh promoter (Henderson and Andrew, 2000), kindly provided by K. Röpper
Fas3 fused with GFP protein trap. BSC 50841
DE-cadherin fused with GFP knock-in allele; homozygous viable (Huang et al., 2009), kindly provided by Y. Hong
DE-cadherin fused with mTomato knock-in allele; homozygous viable (Huang et al., 2009), kindly provided by Y. Hong
Crumbs fused with GFP knock-in allele; homozygous viable (Huang et al., 2009), kindly provided by Y. Hong
Protein trap line: lachesin fused with GFP under endogenous promoter on 2nd chromosome; homozygous viable (kindly provided by the Klämbt Protein trap consortium)
Protein trap line: nervana2 fused with GFP under endogenous promoter on 2nd chromosome; homozygous viable (kindly provided by the Klämbt Protein trap consortium)
A T-STEP cassette was knocked into Ocrl to tag the endogenous protein with TagRFP-T. BSC 66529
On X chromosome, expresses Dlg-mTagRFP under the control of a ubiquitous promoter (Pinheiro et al., 2017), kindly provided by Y. Bellaïche
endogenously YFP::tagged Rab protein library generated in Dunst et al. (2015)
